amendatorysection.catchline: Criminal detention facility; juvenile detention facility; emergency use.
amendatorysection.para: In the event of an emergency and only after all other temporary placement options have been exhausted, the Office of Juvenile Services may provide for the placement of a juvenile for a period not to exceed seven days at a criminal detention facility, if allowed by law, or a juvenile detention facility, as such terms are defined in section 83-4,125.
